comment: Overall I was satisfied with the lab class. He wants the students to do well, so doesn't take kindly to slackers. I had a hard time understanding his explanations, as he did not provide much lab lecture. He expects you to know the material from lecture, in order to complete the lab. He offered extra credit during the Summer and did not curve final.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Chun (a.k.a. Ben) is a young "hip" kind of guy. Makes you feel like he's your friend and not a professor. Always ready to help. A little hard to understand when lecturing if you're not paying attention. Pretty easy class, laid back.

Professor has a thick accent and can be hard to understand sometimes. Generally, a nice guy, but does not grade easily on lab manuals compared to other lab professors. Make sure you setup your lab book right and # pages or else your grade will drop.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.
